rev.comment: previous language made it seem it was somehow a fault on behalf of the update or BIOS or Sony
rev.diff:
Line 108: Line 108:
<blockquote>A number BIOS updates have been released which provide the option to enable VT in the BIOS.
<blockquote>A number BIOS updates have been released which provide the option to enable VT in the BIOS.
If a VT-enabling bios has been published for your VAIO model, you can find it in the Updates section.</blockquote>
If a VT-enabling bios has been published for your VAIO model, you can find it in the Updates section.</blockquote>
â
The released BIOS updates were provided for most of the VAIO range, however it will only list the "Enable VT" option in the BIOS if the [[CPU]] supports it.
+
The released BIOS updates were provided for most of the VAIO range, and as expected, it will only list the "Enable VT" option in the BIOS if the [[CPU]] supports it.
